heading: Instructional television programs.
general-note: This heading is used as a topical heading for works about television programs that use a structured format to teach or train the audience. Works about television programs that are intended to impart knowledge and information, including those for classroom viewing, are entered under. Educational television programs.. When used as topical headings they are subdivided by the appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
Works about the use of television in education are entered under. Television in education..
